'''Demain, des l'aube''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[Fountain of Belleau]]''.

This soundtrack is featured as a tune contained within [[Radiant Spincrystal 107]].

==Trivia==
*''{{w|Demain dès l'aube|Demain, dès l'aube...}}'' is a poem by French author {{w|Victor Hugo}}, talking about an early morning walk to mourn at his daughter's grave.
